amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following new section: SEC. __. None of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act may be used to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel to carry out a market access program under section 203 of the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 (7 U.S.C. 5623).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel to carry out a market access program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 101 - 314 (Roll no. 457).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A062) Failed by recorded vote: 101 - 314 (Roll no. 457).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Flake.
